events.message: We received John's application for the Software Engineer position in our backend team.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation.
Recruiter Sarah was assigned to manage John's recruitment process for the software developer role.
Sarah conducted an initial phone screening with John to assess his background and technical skills.
John responded promptly, expressing strong interest and confirming availability for the next interview stage.
A technical interview with the engineering team was scheduled for John on May 5th at 10 AM.
John completed his technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding abilities.
HR interview was scheduled with John for May 7th to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
John completed the HR interview expressing enthusiasm about joining the company and its culture.
An official job offer was extended to John for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation.
John provided positive feedback on the offer and indicated he was reviewing the final details before acceptance.
John officially accepted the job offer and confirmed his start date for June 1st.
John began onboarding, completing the required documentation and attending orientation sessions.
The hiring process for John was officially closed after successful completion of onboarding activities.
